originalTitle: Zimbabwe rejects 'lopsided' US health aid deal over data concerns
title: Zimbabwe rejects 'lopsided' US health aid deal over data concerns
content: Access to biological samples raised flags for Zimbabwe as the US did not want to share the benefits of its research.

originalTitle: Pope Leo to visit four African countries in April
title: Pope Leo to visit four African countries in April
content: This is the first time that a pope will visit Algeria, whose population is mostly Muslim.

originalTitle: UN sanctions paramilitary leaders over Sudan atrocities
title: UN sanctions paramilitary leaders over Sudan atrocities
content: The RSF's capture of the city in October was one of the most brutal chapters of Sudan's nearly three-year civil war.

originalTitle: Zelenskyy speaks with Trump about peace efforts, eyes leaders-level talks
title: Zelenskyy speaks with Trump about peace efforts, eyes leaders-level talks
content: Conversation precedes meeting between US and Ukrainian envoys in Geneva on Thursday.

originalTitle: Mexico prepares for 40-hour workweek by 2030 in major labour overhaul
title: Mexico prepares for 40-hour workweek by 2030 in major labour overhaul
content: Mexico's ruling Morena party hailed the bill's successful passage after years of back-and-forth with business owners.

originalTitle: Vinicius hits winner as Real Madrid eliminate Benfica from Champions League
title: Vinicius hits winner as Real Madrid eliminate Benfica from Champions League
content: Aurelien Tchouameni and Vinicius Jr ⁠score to ⁠help Madrid fight back in playoff second-leg to grab a 3-1 aggregate win.

originalTitle: 'Fear is everywhere': BBC reports from Mexican city turned into war zone by drug cartel feud
title: 'Fear is everywhere': BBC reports from Mexican city turned into war zone by drug cartel feud
content: Culiacán in northern Mexico has seen a surge in violence as rival factions of the Sinaloa cartel battle for control.

originalTitle: Watch: BBC on streets of Mexican city gripped by deadly cartel violence
title: Watch: BBC on streets of Mexican city gripped by deadly cartel violence
content: BBC international correspondent Quentin Sommerville travelled to Culiacán in northern Sinaloa state following an explosion in violence.

originalTitle: Trump keeps world waiting on his plans for Iran after State of the Union
title: Trump keeps world waiting on his plans for Iran after State of the Union
content: The next round of talks between the US and Iran in Geneva on Thursday could be decisive in the president's decision-making.

originalTitle: 'Darlings of Italian football' - how Atalanta salvaged national pride
title: 'Darlings of Italian football' - how Atalanta salvaged national pride
content: As Italy faced the embarrassment of having no clubs in the Champions League last 16, Atalanta became the saviours of national reputation - and pride.

originalTitle: 'He was always going to score' - Real beat Benfica to reach last 16
title: 'He was always going to score' - Real beat Benfica to reach last 16
content: Watch as Real Madrid head through to the last 16 in the Champions League after a 2-1 victory against Benfica.

originalTitle: PSG avoid late scare against 10-man Monaco
title: PSG avoid late scare against 10-man Monaco
content: PSG held on despite a late Jordan Teze goal, after Marquinhos and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia scored in quick succesion to seal the tie for French champions, as Mamadou Coulibaly was sent off for Monaco.
